workflow.name: Real-time Bitcoin price alerts with Bright Data & n8n
workflow.description:
## Description

This workflow monitors Bitcoin prices across multiple exchanges and sends you alerts when significant price drops occur. It helps crypto traders and investors identify buying opportunities without constantly watching the markets.

## Overview

This workflow monitors Bitcoin prices across multiple exchanges and sends you alerts when significant price drops occur. It uses Bright Data to scrape real-time price data and can be configured to notify you through various channels.

### Tools Used

*   **n8n:** The automation platform that orchestrates the workflow.
*   **Bright Data:** For scraping cryptocurrency exchange data without getting blocked.
*   **Notification Services:** Email, SMS, Telegram, or other messaging platforms.

## How to Install

1.  **Import the Workflow:** Download the `.json` file and import it into your n8n instance.
2.  **Configure Bright Data:** Add your Bright Data credentials to the Bright Data node.
3.  **Set Up Notifications:** Configure your preferred notification method.
4.  **Customize:** Set your price thresholds, monitoring frequency, and which exchanges to track.

## Use Cases

*   **Crypto Traders:** Get notified of buying opportunities during price dips.
*   **Investors:** Monitor your crypto investments and make informed decisions.
*   **Financial Analysts:** Track Bitcoin price movements for market analysis.

---

## Connect with Me

*   **Website:** [https://www.nofluff.online](https://www.nofluff.online)
*   **YouTube:** [https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos](https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos)
*   **LinkedIn:** [https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/)
*   **Get Bright Data:** [https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25](https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25) (Using this link supports my free workflows with a small commission)

#n8n #automation #bitcoin #cryptocurrency #brightdata #pricealerts #cryptotrading #bitcoinalerts #cryptoalerts #cryptomonitoring #n8nworkflow #workflow #nocode #cryptoinvesting #bitcoinprice #cryptomarket #tradingalerts #cryptotools #bitcointrading #pricemonitoring #cryptoautomation #bitcoininvestment #cryptotracker #marketalerts #tradingopportunities #cryptoprices

parameters.subject: =Bitcoin Price has dropped {{ $json.dropPercent }}%

parameters.content:
=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

# üìâüí∞ **Bitcoin Price Drop Alert Workflow**

This automated workflow checks the current Bitcoin price and **sends an email alert if it drops by 5% or more** compared to the last recorded value. It‚Äôs split into 3 easy-to-understand sections:

---

## üîé **Section 1: Fetch the Current Bitcoin Price**

üß© **Nodes:**

1. **‚ö° Manual Trigger**
2. **üåê Fetch Bitcoin Price**
3. **üß± Extract Price**

### üß† What Happens:

* **‚ö° Manual Trigger**
  This starts the process manually. Think of it like pressing a "Start" button.

* **üåê Fetch Bitcoin Price**
  Uses the [Bright Data API](https://brightdata.com/) to scrape the live Bitcoin price from a specific website using a POST request.

* **üß± Extract Price**
  Extracts the **exact price value** from the scraped HTML using selectors (like CSS paths).

### üí° Why It‚Äôs Useful:

You can track the **real-time price** of Bitcoin straight from any public site, even those not offering official APIs. It's like building your own live feed.

---

## üìä **Section 2: Calculate and Compare with Historical Price**

üß© **Nodes:**
4\. **üîÑ Convert Type**
5\. **üìó Get Last Recorded Price (Google Sheet)**
6\. **üìâ Find Drop Percentage**

### üß† What Happens:

* **üîÑ Convert Type**
  Converts the price from a text format to a number so we can calculate with it.

* **üìó Get Last Recorded Price**
  Pulls the **previous Bitcoin price** from a Google Sheet (a record from last check). Acts like your ‚Äúmemory‚Äù.

* **üìâ Find Drop Percentage**
  Calculates how much the price has dropped:

  $$
  \text{Drop (\%)} = \frac{\text{Previous Price - Current Price}}{\text{Previous Price}} \times 100
  $$

### üí° Why It‚Äôs Useful:

You‚Äôre comparing real-time data with past values automatically‚Äîno spreadsheets or calculators needed! This makes it ideal for **traders or enthusiasts** watching for price alerts.

---

## üö® **Section 3: Send Alert if Drop ‚â• 5%**

üß© **Nodes:**
7\. **üîÄ If droppercentage >= 5**
8\. **üìß Send Alert Email**
9\. **‚û°Ô∏è No Alert Needed**

### üß† What Happens:

* **üîÄ If Statement**
  Checks: Has the price dropped by **5% or more**?

* **üìß Send Alert Email** (if true)
  Automatically sends an email to notify you about the drop. This could go to your inbox, or a team.

* **‚û°Ô∏è No Alert Needed** (if false)
  The workflow ends quietly without doing anything else.

### üí° Why It‚Äôs Useful:

It **only alerts you when it matters**, saving your attention for big changes. You don‚Äôt need to monitor prices all day.

---

## üéÅ **Final Benefits:**

‚úÖ **No coding required**
‚úÖ **Real-time price check**
‚úÖ **Smart alerts based on thresholds**
‚úÖ **Great for traders, analysts, or crypto fans**
‚úÖ **Fully extendable** ‚Äì you could log alerts, update the sheet, send Slack/Telegram messages, etc.

---

## üåà BONUS IDEA:

Want it to run automatically? Add a **üïí Cron Trigger** to check every 10 mins, 1 hour, or even daily!

---

## üîé **Section 1: Fetch the Current Bitcoin Price**

üß© **Nodes:**

1. **‚ö° Manual Trigger**
2. **üåê Fetch Bitcoin Price**
3. **üß± Extract Price**

### üß† What Happens:

* **‚ö° Manual Trigger**
  This starts the process manually. Think of it like pressing a "Start" button.

* **üåê Fetch Bitcoin Price**
  Uses the [Bright Data API](https://brightdata.com/) to scrape the live Bitcoin price from a specific website using a POST request.

### üí° Why It‚Äôs Useful:

You can track the **real-time price** of Bitcoin straight from any public site, even those not offering official APIs. It's like building your own live feed.

## üìä **Section 2: Calculate and Compare with Historical Price**

5\. **üìó Get Last Recorded Price (Google Sheet)**

### üß† What Happens:

* **üîÑ Convert Type**
  Converts the price from a text format to a number so we can calculate with it.

* **üìó Get Last Recorded Price**
  Pulls the **previous Bitcoin price** from a Google Sheet (a record from last check). Acts like your ‚Äúmemory‚Äù.

* **üìâ Find Drop Percentage**

  $$
  \text{Drop (\%)} = \frac{\text{Previous Price - Current Price}}{\text{Previous Price}} \times 100

### üí° Why It‚Äôs Useful:

You‚Äôre comparing real-time data with past values automatically‚Äîno spreadsheets or calculators needed! This makes it ideal for **traders or enthusiasts** watching for price alerts.

---

## üö® **Section 3: Send Alert if Drop ‚â• 5%**

üß© **Nodes:**
7\. **üîÄ If droppercentage >= 5**
8\. **üìß Send Alert Email**
9\. **‚û°Ô∏è No Alert Needed**

### üß† What Happens:

* **üîÄ If Statement**
  Checks: Has the price dropped by **5% or more**?

* **üìß Send Alert Email** (if true)
  Automatically sends an email to notify you about the drop. This could go to your inbox, or a team.

* **‚û°Ô∏è No Alert Needed** (if false)
  The workflow ends quietly without doing anything else.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
